nodes.text: Checkpoint Gamma was an Imperial checkpoint that was set up in Ahdjok, the capital city of Nizon, by the Galactic Empire.

The Imperials set up the checkpoint across a wide street, during the Battle of Nizon. They built two 1.5 meter high ferroconcrete barricades, with a gap in the middle that was guarded by three AT-RTs. It was a serious obstacle to the Nizon resistance, as it prevented their two largest groups from connecting. A team of Alderaanian Resistance agents attacked it, to try and help them break through.
